ticketrafflesystem.entered.message: $1 entries added to the ticket raffle! ($2 tickets in total)

ticketrafflesystem.err.missing.syntax.message: Usage: !traffle open [max entries] [regulars ticket multiplier (default = 1)] [subscribers ticket multiplier (default = 1)] [cost] [-followers]

ticketrafflesystem.err.not.following.message: You need to be following to enter.

ticketrafflesystem.err.points.message: You don't have enough $1 to enter.

ticketrafflesystem.err.raffle.not.opened.message: There is no ticket raffle opened.

ticketrafflesystem.err.raffle.opened.message: A ticket raffle is already opened.

ticketrafflesystem.limit.hit.message: You're only allowed to buy $1 ticket(s)

ticketrafflesystem.msg.disabled.message: Ticket raffle message's have been disabled.

ticketrafflesystem.msg.enabled.message: Ticket raffle message's have been enabled.

ticketrafflesystem.msg.need.to.be.follwi.message: You need to be following to enter.

ticketrafflesystem.raffle.close.err.message: The ticket raffle ended. No one entered.

ticketrafflesystem.raffle.closed.message: The ticket raffle is now closed. Use "!traffle draw" to draw a winner.

ticketrafflesystem.raffle.opened.message: Ticket raffle is now open! Buy up to $1 tickets with !tickets - you can purchase multiple times. Tickets cost $2. $3

ticketrafflesystem.ticket.usage.message: Usage: !tickets (amount) - And you currently have $1 tickets.

ticketrafflesystem.usage.message: Usage: !traffle open [max entries] [regulars ticket multiplier (default = 1)] [subscribers ticket multiplier (default = 1)] [cost] [-followers]

ticketrafflesystem.winner.message: The winner of this ticket raffle is: $1! $2
